definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: Modify your diet to exclude or limit dairy products, alcohol, smoking or other stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 不喫或少喫乳製品，儘量不要接近菸酒或其他刺激物。

sentences.english: Glacial acetic acid is a dehydrating agent and an irritant and is corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 冰醋酸是個脫水代理及刺激物和腐蝕。
工作場所的化學刺激物。

sentences.english: What I needed was a stimulus.
sentences.chinese: 我所需的是一件刺激物。

sentences.english: Body movement is an effective brain stimulator.
sentences.chinese: 身體運動是大腦強有效的刺激物。

sentences.english: Patch test proved that fresh Clematis chinensis osbeck was the primary irritant.
sentences.chinese: 斑貼試驗證實鮮威靈仙全草系原發性刺激物。

sentences.english: The hypocrisy inherent in the American conversation about stimulants is staggering.
sentences.chinese: 美國人談論中固有的關於刺激物的虛僞是驚人的。

sentences.english: The guaraná berry, for example, is known as a stimulant.
sentences.chinese: 例如，瓜拿納莓果是衆所周知的一種刺激物。

sentences.english: Acute bronchitis can be caused by infection or by exposure to irritants.
sentences.chinese: 急性支氣管炎是由感染或接觸刺激物引起。

sentences.english: The mild stimulant makes the hardships of life in Mogadishu feel more bearable.
sentences.chinese: 這種淡味的刺激物使得摩加迪沙生活的艱難略爲好過。

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
